title: How Much Do Electric Vehicles Cost to ‘Fill Up’ Compared With Buying Gasoline?
sub_head: Where you live is the biggest factor, and EV road trips could lead to sticker shock
body:
Auto makers plan to electrify their future lineups, upending the way drivers fuel. Congress just gave a jolt to those efforts, passing a $1 trillion infrastructure bill that includes billions for EV charging.
What does it cost to “fill up” an electric vehicle? Is it really cheaper?
